# Government Tender Announcement
## Net Zero Carbon and Energy Management Services
### Solicitation Number: NR23SL02_81065
**Information:**  
- **Publication Date:**   January 12th, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 28th, 2024 
- **Amendment Number:** 3 
- **Solicitation Number:** NR23SL02_81065
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Contracting Entity:** Defence Construction Canada / Construction de Défense Canada

**Objective:** Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from consulting firms to provide professional services, as and when required, for the Department of National Defence (DND) at various locations across Canada, excluding Nunavut. The services will focus on Net Zero Carbon studies and Energy Management.

**Eligibility and Tender Requirements:**  
Firms with the necessary qualifications and experience can submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date. Proponents can obtain the contract award results from the DCC Website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.ca).

**Scope of Work:** The purpose of this tool is to support DND in meeting their Greening Government Strategy commitments and policy requirements.

**Required Services and Evaluation Criteria:**

- **Project Manager:** 
- **Energy Engineer - Senior:** 
- **Energy Engineer - Intermediate:** 
- **Mechanical Engineer - Senior:** 
- **Mechanical Engineer - Intermediate:** 
- **Electrical Engineer - Senior:** 
- **Electrical Engineer - Intermediate:** 
- **Geoscientist - Senior:** 
- **Senior Technical Support:** 
- **Intermediate Technical Support:** 
- **Total Classification Rate:** 

**Important Details:**

- **Tender Description:** The estimated value of individual commissions under the SL is $350,000+, With a total maximum value of all commissions under the SL of $7,000,000 and a total maximum term of the SL of 5 years.
- **Document Availability:** The RFP documents are available on MERX at [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing).
- **Contact Information:** Defence Construction Canada / Construction de Défense Canada
